import React from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import Router from "next/router"; const Profile = ({ form }) => { if (form.fullName !== "" || form.email !== "" || form.password !== "") { Router.push("/"); } return (

{form.fullName}

{form.email}

An artist of considerable range, Chet Faker — the name taken by Melbourne-raised, Brooklyn-based Nick Murphy — writes, performs and records all of his own music, giving it a warm, intimate feel with a solid groove structure.


); }; function mapStateToProps(state) { const { form } = state; return { form }; } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Profile);
